column5: A friend of mine lost the cover for his motor on the way home last week.  Price from the dealer to replace it is over $700 for a new one when you add in all the handles, gaskets etc.  Anyone know of an alternative?  Have checked Kijiji etc. already.
Try looking under insurance recoveries? Sometimes a motor is written off because of lower end damage, but the cover might still be OK.
Ontario Boat Wreckers might be able to point you in the right direction. 705-333-5533
Buddy had same thing last year. Got home and noticed his cover was missing.  800 for a new one.. got one shipped in from bc with no decals on it for 200... got the decals for 40 afterwards
